column1: Family will greet friends on Friday June 12
column2: 2015 from 4:00pm to 7:00pm at the Denzer-Farison-Hottinger & Snyder Funeral
column4: Ohio.  Funeral services will be at the funeral home Saturday June 13th at 10:00am Reverend Rob Howard will officiate and burial will follow in the Waldo Cemetery.
